summary: Provides dataset classes and factory functions for loading audio-to-label data, supporting speech labeling, classification, and multi‑label tasks, with variants for regular, tarred, and concatenated datasets and optional preprocessing augmentations.
business_intent: Facilitates the creation of scalable data pipelines for training and evaluating speech models that map audio inputs to various label types, enabling efficient handling of large or distributed datasets within the NeMo ASR framework.
